trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SEQ_00<tab>The fear in Alisaie's eyes is unlike anything you have ever seen before.

TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SEQ_01<tab>After securing a foothold in the Peaks by seizing Ala Ghiri, the Eorzean Alliance and the Resistance set their sights on the next logical target: Specula Imperatoris. And so a great host, led by General Aldynn and Commander Kemp, laid siege to the towers. But when the massive cannon at Castrum Abania was used to destroy the main tower of Specula Imperatoris, killing countless Allied and imperial troops, it was plain the rules of engagement had changed...

TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SEQ_02<tab>You struggle to keep up with Alisaie as she runs towards what is left of Specula Imperatoris. Desperate to find her brother, she pushes through the gates before you can even think to stop her.

TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SEQ_03<tab>Though Alphinaud and many others are nowhere to be seen, you find General Aldynn and Marshal Tarupin in the thick of things, bellowing orders left and right, in a bid to organize their forces' withdrawal. Seeing that Alisaie is on the verge of hysteria, Raubahn reminds her that you all have a job to do: aiding the wounded.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SEQ_04<tab>Amidst the debris, you find several Alliance soldiers and help them to the best of your ability. Yet for every man you save, there are many more you cannot...

TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SEQ_05<tab>While comforting a Temple Knight who remembers you from the Steps of Faith, you hear Lyse pleading for Conrad to open his eyes. At least one of your comrades lives, but what of the others?

TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SEQ_06<tab>You find Lyse, M'naago, and Alphinaud tending to Conrad, who lies motionless upon the ground. Though the others escaped with only minor injuries, the grizzled commander's are unquestionably mortal. He uses his final moments to implore Lyse to succeed him as leader of the Ala Mhigan Resistance, and she tearfully accepts, promising to lead their countrymen to freedom. Safe in the knowledge that his legacy is secure, Conrad Kemp smiles and breathes his last.

TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SEQ_07<tab>Alphinaud is incensed, swearing bloody vengeance for Conrad's death and the indiscriminate slaughter at Specula Imperatoris. For indeed, what manner of monster would order the death of his own...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_TODO_00<tab>Follow Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Raubahn.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_TODO_02<tab>Search for wounded soldiers in need of assistance.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_TODO_03<tab>Continue searching for wounded soldiers.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>This way! There's no time to lose!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>The locks on the massive gate appear to have been disabled. You need only prise them open to pass through...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_AREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>Proceed into Specula Imperatoris?
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>It's worse than it looks─ H-He probably wasn't even─ <var 1A 02 /var>Pull yourself together.<var 1A 01 /var> The gate. This is our way inside.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>We need to find my brother. Right...now.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>Damn it! I-I don't see them. My brother or Lyse. Maybe the General knows something.

TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_RAUBAHN_000_030<tab>I'm glad you're here, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>. In case it isn't obvious, the imperials fired on us. On Specula Imperatoris.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_RAUBAHN_000_031<tab>I didn't think they had it in them. To kill their own men just to kill us! Gods damn them all!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALISAIE_000_032<tab>Where is my brother? Tell me where he is! I want to see him!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_PIPIN_000_033<tab>He was in the tower when it was struck. But that need not mean anything. Our forces are still evacuating, and many remain unaccounted for.

TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_RAUBAHN_000_034<tab>Alisaie? Alisaie, listen: there are soldiers wounded and dying all around us─soldiers with families, just like you and me. They need our help. Do you understand?
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALISAIE_000_035<tab>...He's right. I'll take the north, you take the east.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_RAUBAHN_000_040<tab>Tell the Adders we need their conjurers ready to receive our wounded! And get me every carriage you can find! They could fire on us again at any moment!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_PIPIN_000_045<tab>It shall be done!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDSERPENTSOLDIER_000_050<tab>Matron...Matron have mercy...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDFLAMESOLDIER_000_055<tab>Godsdammit, my leg...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDSTORMSOLDIER_000_060<tab>Wh-Where am I? What happened?
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDISHGARDIANSOLDIER_000_065<tab>...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDSERPENTSOLDIER_000_070<tab>Thank you. I think...I think I can manage on my own...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDSERPENTSOLDIER_100_070<tab>I'll be fine, really. Just...just give me a moment...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDFLAMESOLDIER_000_071<tab>For a moment there, I thought I was bound for Thal's great hall. Ye gods, what were the imperials thinking...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDFLAMESOLDIER_100_071<tab>I'll go to the carriages once I catch my breath. You needn't worry.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDSTORMSOLDIER_000_072<tab>Just...give me a moment to let the world stop spinning, would you? ...There. Ala Ghiri's not far. I'll make it. I'll make it...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDSTORMSOLDIER_100_072<tab>I swore I'd die at sea, and I'm not about to break that promise.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDISHGARDIANSOLDIER_000_080<tab>Ugh... Everything hurts. I think I was struck by debris from the tower...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDISHGARDIANSOLDIER_000_081<tab>Wait, I know you! <var 29 EB02 /var>! Ward of House Fortemps!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDISHGARDIANSOLDIER_000_082<tab>We fought together on the Steps of Faith. You saved my life back then...and now...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_WOUNDEDISHGARDIANSOLDIER_000_083<tab>I can walk. Thank you. A thousand times, thank you...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_LYSE_000_084<tab>Conrad! Conrad, can you hear me!? Naago, put him down over there!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALPHINAUD_000_085<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Full glad am I to see you! Wait─where is my sister?
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_MNAAGO_000_090<tab>O mighty Rhalgr, O noble Azeyma, I beg of You─do not take him from us!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_LYSE_000_100<tab>I promise...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_MNAAGO_000_105<tab>No, no, no! You can't! Not now... <sniffle> <sob>
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>We could have killed them. We could have walked away...
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALPHINAUD_000_111<tab>But instead we tried to convince them to lay down their arms. We tried to seek a peaceful resolution.
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALPHINAUD_100_111<tab>We showed them mercy, and this was their response. Fire and blood! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> was their answer!
TEXT_STMBDA611_02537_ALPHINAUD_000_112<tab>Such crimes cannot go unpunished. They <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> not! Gods as my witness, there will be a reckoning!
